input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item features and item title information.

Item title:
iCandy Combat Thermal Execution Targets Shooter Targets for Shooting Range Target

Item features:
Thermal Targets
Made In USA
13x19 Size
Thick Paper Targets
iCandy Combat Design
input_text.Response A: These thermal targets are made in the USA, feature the iCandy Combat design, are 13x19 inches in size, and have thick paper for superior resilience. They are ideal for shooting practice at the range, and will make a great addition to your gear.
input_text.Response B: These thermal targets are the ultimate shooting range addition for any shooter looking to up their game. The iCandy Combat Thermal Execution Targets are 13x19-inch thick paper targets featuring the iconic iCandy Combat design. Made in the USA, these targets are a must-have for any shooter looking to improve their accuracy and precision. With thermal targets, you can see your shots on the target even in low-light conditions, making it easier to track your progress and see your improvements. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, these targets are a must-have for any shooter. So, come on and give them a try today!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
